flavorText:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

foreignData.flavorText: „Hör auf zu dozieren, Magier. Wir wollen nicht noch mehr heiße Luft erzeugen." —Tala Vertan, Makindi-Schildbruder
foreignData.name: Geysirgleiter
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält der Geysirgleiter bis zum Ende des Zuges Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: "Deja de gesticular, mago. Lo último que queremos es enfurecerlo más aún." —Tala Vertan, escudante de Makindi
foreignData.name: Deslizador de geiser
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Deslizador de geiser gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Cesse de pontifier, mage. La dernière chose à faire, ce serait de lui fournir plus d'air chaud. » —Tala Vertan, compagnon bouclier des Makindi
foreignData.name: Planeur de geyser
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Planeur de geyser acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Smettila di pontificare, mago. L'ultima cosa che vogliamo è fornirgli altra aria calda." —Tala Vertan, scutifero di Makindi
foreignData.name: Planatore di Geyser
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Planatore di Geyser ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「思い上がるなよ、魔道士さんよ。 これ以上奴を熱くしちゃいけないだろう。」 ――マキンディの盾の仲間、タラ・ヴェルタン
foreignData.name: 噴火滑り
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、噴火滑りはターン終了時まで飛行を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・ビースト

foreignData.flavorText: "Deixe de pontificar, mago. A última coisa que queremos é botar mais lenha nessa fogueira." — Tala Vertan, escudeiro de Makindi
foreignData.name: Planador de Gêiser
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, Planador de Gêiser ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Хватит разглагольствовать, маг! Не хватало только поддуть ему горячего воздуха». — Тала Вертан, заступник из Макинди
foreignData.name: Гейзеровый Летяга
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Гейзеровый Летяга получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「少装模作样了，法师。 我们最后只会把热空气变得更多而已。」 ～马钦迪护盾手塔勒沃顿
foreignData.name: 热泉滑翔兽
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，热泉滑翔兽获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

name: Geyser Glider
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: The landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability (such as Rampant Growth) causes you to put a land onto the battlefield under your control. It will even trigger when a spell or ability causes another player to put a land onto the battlefield under your control (as can happen with Yavimaya Dryad’s ability, for example).

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.
